Version: 1.0.0

Package Type: Intranet Static Deployment

Client: Al Rajhi Bank Malaysia (ARBM)

This package contains all files necessary for deployment on corporate intranet servers.
No external dependencies or internet connectivity required.

For support and documentation, see DEPLOYMENT_README.md
